description: Kammalgoda Mudalige Priyantha Hewasinghe Vs The Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Kammalgoda Mudalige Priyantha Hewasinghe Vs The Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Contradictions and omissions of witness testimony – Determining whether contradictions and omissions of testimonies are material to the case – Testimonies disputed by witnesses being supported by additional evidence from other witnesses and physical evidence
